amendment.description: An amendment No. 58 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to amend certain sections of Title 49 of the U.S. Code to increase penalties relating to commercial motor vehicle safety.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Chabot amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Chabot to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Chabot to the Rules amendment (A001).
